meanings.definition: A mechanical seal that fills the space between two mating surfaces to prevent leakage.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic replaced the worn gasket to stop the oil from leaking out of the engine.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the gasket for any cracks before installing it in the machine.
meanings.sent3: When the gasket went missing, the water pipe turned into a fountain!
meanings.sent4: Her smile acted like a gasket, sealing away her true feelings from everyone.
meanings.sent5: The gasket was like a tiny guardian, protecting the precious contents within.

meanings.definition: A ring or sheet of rubber or other material used to seal a joint in a pipe or cylinder.
meanings.sent1: The plumber used a gasket to ensure there were no leaks in the pipe connection.
meanings.sent2: The gasket was carefully placed to create a tight seal between the two metal parts.
meanings.sent3: The rubber gasket decided it was tired of being squished between pipes all day.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as a gasket, sealing their friendship with trust and understanding.
meanings.sent5: The gasket hugged the pipe snugly, like a protective barrier against leaks.
